description:
'''Theodore Michael Leonard''' (born September 22, 1971) is an American vocalist and guitarist, best known as the lead singer for the [[progressive rock]] band [[Enchant (band)|Enchant]]. He has also provided lead vocals for [[Thought Chamber]], [[Spock's Beard]], and [[Pattern-Seeking Animals]] as well as backing vocals, guitars, and keyboards for the 2014 and 2022 [[Transatlantic_(band)|Transatlantic]] live tours.

Leonard's influences include [[Paul Rodgers]], [[Doug Pinnick]]/[[King's X]], [[Jellyfish (band)|Jellyfish]], [[Steve Walsh (musician)|Steve Walsh]]/[[Kansas (band)|Kansas]], [[Yes (band)|Yes]], [[Rush (band)|Rush]], [[Tears for Fears]], [[Neal Morse]], [[Steve Perry (musician)|Steve Perry]], and [[Queensr√øche]].
